entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Visual Studio Inserting Duplicate "Option Strict On" in VB.NET Class files #73827
  • Enable argument wrapping code fix for collection expressions #73826
    Backlog

Closed

  • Internal compiler crash when compiler diagnostic CS0103 is expected #73813
  • Incorrect receiver capture with `ref C` receiver and interpolation handler #73667
    17.11
  • Allow multiple break/continue keywords in a row #73824
  • macOS tests are crashing regularly #70233

PullRequests

Created

  • Workaround issue with invalid diagnostics reported via TS workspace diagnostics #73833
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Global options2 #73832
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not report warnings because there is non-array params candidate among applicable dynamic candidates. #73829
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • WIP: test. #73828
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add ability to rewrite symbol references in BoundTreeRewriter. #73825
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles

Merged

  • Upgrade MicrosoftCodeAnalysisTestingVersion to 1.1.2-beta1.24121.1 #73831
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Optimize helper we use to determine the relevant node of a particular kind the user is on. #73812
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Always use a by-value temp to capture a reference type receiver #73631
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Fix build host when only the .net 6 SDK is installed #73818
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch to workspace service to ensure the analyzer loader uses streams on linux #73809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Global options #73808
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73682
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Build interval tree from sorted nodes #73819
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce Linq usage in SymbolDisplayVisitor.CreateAliasMap #73793
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers() #73794
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal optimization #73650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix exponential blowup parsing pathological files #73788
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Generate ISymbol implementations at runtime to avoid type load errors #73675
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Report diagnostic for `field` and `value` identifiers in property accessors where the meaning would change as contextual keywords #73570
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Expose 5 more things to Razor cohosting #73781
  • Rename SG run mode from Balanced to Manual #73784
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Check duplicate interfaces only for metadata #73797
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
